title: Vanished
description: LOOK BACK IN TERRORLovely young Linda Tyler had made a new life after her husband's tragic death - the gift shop she owned made her living and filled her time. Then, one fateful day, a handsome stranger entered the shop - and turned her placid life into a nightmare!Linda refused to believe the incredible story he told - but then terror began to envelop her as she realized that someone was prying into her belongings, raking up her past and her lost husband's. What secret had there been in Rad Tyler's life so dreadful that it now came back to haunt his widow...perhaps to threaten her very life?The stranger with the cool, gray eyes knew - but dared she trust him?
author: Marjorie Carleton
